title: Oppy on Thomistic cosmological arguments
author: Edward Feser
content: My article “Oppy on Thomistic cosmological arguments” has just been published in the latest issue of the journal Religious Studies. (It’s behind a paywall, sorry.) It is a reply to all of the criticisms Graham Oppy has leveled over the years against arguments of that sort, not only in his Religious Studiesarticle on my Aristotelian proof, but also in his books Arguing about Gods and Naturalism and Religion and elsewhere. (Regular readers will recall the two YouTube exchanges I had with Oppy on the program Capturing Christianity, which you can view here and here.)
